name: Asteroid Rush (Yknr)
description:
Controller required.  The premise is to dodge asteroids.  It is a manic endless runner inspired by old arcade games, and was made for the Becker IGDA arcade jam.  It has since been updated and is currently in beta.  If you have input concerning the game, feel free to email it to yknr@yknr.info.

*NOTE*  Development of Asteroid rush is currently secondary to other projects.
